line_1: No Mother's bosom the soft maid befriends;
line_2: The heavens lour dismal while the storm descends,

line_1: Th'Unfortunate Man, whom any Muse befriends.

line_1: And oft the team and shiv'ring herd befriends;
line_2: To more than man this generous warmth extends,
